website_summaries.verdict: An adjustable shower cap that will keep your hair dry and won't pinch your scalp.
pros: Adjustable drawstring to accommodate all users
cons: Expensive compared to the other products listed here

customer_reviews.title: "The Mercedes of Shower Caps"
customer_reviews.text: It's nice having a shower cap that completely covers all of your hair. This cap is comfortable,no hard scratchy edges. The drawstring it certainly a plus .When you pull the elastic cord it stays tight and is easy to adjust as you push the little button. The cap also has a really cute diva like picture on the back which makes it nice if you want to keep your cap hanging handy in the bathroom. They even provided a "stick on" wall hook !
customer_reviews.author: Msnini

customer_reviews.title: Fits big hair, great price, quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love it! It fit all of my locks into it with no problem. It stayed on while I showered and it’s very comfortable. Love that it comes with a hook to hang it. Love love love it. 5stars
customer_reviews.author: nick abitia

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Smell
customer_reviews.text: This has an overpowering rubber/chemically smell as soon as I took it out of the package. Unfortunately there is no way I am putting this on my head.
customer_reviews.author: Keren

customer_reviews.title: If you have long hair this shower cap will be the answer to your prayers!
customer_reviews.text: I have an extra large and large shower cap. I am going to use one for vacations and one for home. I am blessed with long curly hair and its been hard and stressful trying to find shower cap that keeps my hair dry! This is the only shower cap I have been able to find in years that helps keep my hair dry! We still have winter like weather in NYC and a good shower cap is a must! If you have long hair this shower cap will be the answer to your prayers!
customer_reviews.author: Pinky Lew

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable, Durable & Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is an absolutely wonderful product which came in handy for me right away! I have long braids that will not fit in a regular shower cap at all. My braids are almost to the middle of my back. When I put them in a bun, still the regular shower caps don't fit. This one not only fit, but was adjustable and I could tell that it is very durable. I look forward to showering and knowing that my hair will not get wet! This is an awesome product and I don't know why I didn't look for it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Von B

customer_reviews.title: Better quality than I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: I really like this shower cap. I didn’t realize when I bought it that it has a drawstring, which is better in the long run than elastic, especially for longer protective styles that may stretch out elastic over time. Covered my booty-length box braids with room to spare. Very comfortable to wear and effective at keeping hair completely dry. It’s nice that it comes with an adhesive hook to hang the cap up to dry if you need it. It did have a strong plastic-y smell out of the bag that reminded me of pool floaties, but ultimately it didn’t bother me.
customer_reviews.author: A S

customer_reviews.title: Won't smash your hair down!
customer_reviews.text: I researched all the shower caps available. I wanted one that would not allow steam and an undersized cap to flatten my hair. My hair is below my shoulders. It fits nicely into this cap and retains the style. The drawstring takes away the problem of elastic losing it's zing. It flattens out nicely for travel in my suitcase. I sure didn't want to spend $35 or $40 just for a shower cap! I didn't have to with this one, and I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: ALLESANDRA

customer_reviews.title: Pretty but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: The concept was great but needs work. The art design was pretty but it's not perfect. It will eventually start to rub away and become a sticky ugly mess, so there needs to be a better solution. Maybe instead of printing the design on top of the material, maybe the material could be dyed to accommodate designs. Also, the elastic is kinda rough on the skin after awhile. I find myself readjusting the tightness throughout the day to keep from getting headaches or tender skin especially during my long deep conditioning days.
customer_reviews.author: Honest Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very well made
customer_reviews.text: No idea why other reviewers have said this is a thin shower cap. It's not. It is very thick and durable. However, I returned it because I wanted something that would keep smells out of my hair. Because this is not an elastic band, it does not go completely tightly around the head. It would be fine for showering. But if you are going into places that smell from all the fabric softeners people use, this will not work.
customer_reviews.author: lindalou

customer_reviews.title: A great solution for big hair
customer_reviews.text: So far this is really a stress reliever for my long, curly, thick hair teen. She was using 2 shower caps at times to make sure it was all covered. Yes this the XL is really big but if you have the length or are wearing a big style this is great. My daughter usually does a top bun to shower. It is huge and tall. This shower cap covers it completely as well as her edges. Definitely make sure you dry the gathers as best as possible after showering and hang it to finish drying. I'm so glad one of my FB hair group friends turned us on to this.
customer_reviews.author: DanaS

customer_reviews.title: Works very well. Decal starting to flake off
customer_reviews.text: So I bought this back in April 2020 and it is amazing. However after about a month the seem started to split and tore so now I have a large area that the draw string does not hold back anymore. Also when I went to clean the cap (cuz it started to stink) the white decal started to flake off. Now when I take it on and off small bits of the decal flake off on to me and the floor. Super annoying but at least my hair is still dry.
customer_reviews.author: C. Ormon

customer_reviews.title: hard to use
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it said adjustable. There is no stretch to the elastic part so it is very difficult to get on. You would need to adjust it every time you use it. Sending it back.
customer_reviews.author: Sophia Poppy

customer_reviews.title: ... cap is just right for my hair but construction sucks. I constantly have to re-thread the string thru ...
customer_reviews.text: The size of the cap is just right for my hair but construction sucks. I constantly have to re-thread the string thru the cap, which is very tedious and time consuming. The cord/string lock is not tight or secure enough to stop the string from coming thru. I would not purchase again. Update: Thank you Simply Elegant, I received the replacement caps. The cord lock seems much more secure on the replacement. I really appreciate you taking the time to reach out to me to rectify my issue. That was great customer service and I will be recommending your product to friends.
customer_reviews.author: chontennia harris

customer_reviews.title: Good cap could be great.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a good cap, can expand very big and cover my curly hair when it’s in a pineapple! However, it is not LINED with satin inside the cap.. that was deceiving as satin can help maintain moisture and help with no frizz.. These should go back into production.
customer_reviews.author: Johnay

customer_reviews.title: Natural Hair Friendly
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for a while now and this is my favorite shower cap! Didn't think I'd ever have a favorite shower cap lol. This thing is HUGE! I can fit it over my perm rods and my bonnet. The drawstring keeps a tight seal with you allowing how much tension goes around your head. The silky interior is great for my natural hair when it's in a bun or puff. The outside is definitely waterproof, seems really durable, and the design adds to my bathroom decor. I think I'm going to buy a second one for travelling so I dont accidentally forget my "house shower cap" somewhere else
customer_reviews.author: Vanyha Rose

customer_reviews.title: Overall great for long hair, a bit goofy
customer_reviews.text: This is probably too large, but I do understand it's intended for long or very full hair. The branded design on the cap is really goofy, too. I do like the adjustable string. I do have to cinch it uncomfortably tight to keep the edge close enough to my head to prevent excess humidity from getting my curls damp.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my long hair!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is just what I needed. The ones in stores are always too small or too expensive. This fit all of my hair with ease. I put a regular bonnet on to keep my hair together and then put the shower cap over and it holds everything in. The circumference of my head isn’t that large so there was a lot of material once I scrunched it closed so I maybe should have gotten one size smaller but other ham that it will come in handy for future large hairstyles and just daily use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Blake

customer_reviews.title: AMAAAAZING + AWESOMENESS 👍😊
customer_reviews.text: All my life & all this years of becoming an adult, I have NEVER seen any showercup that can cover an entire braids without it getting wet, WOW WOW WOW this is INCREDIBLE & AMAZING , I wish I can rate 100 ☆s . I'm gonna order 5 more to keep just incase they discontinue... THANKS SO MUCH FOR THIS AWESOME CUP , NOW I CAN BRAID & SHOWER IN PEACE 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: L. A

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Where do I start. I love this shower cap. I have a lot of hair and hate when the back and sides of my hair gets wet with other shower caps. This shower cap is not only huge, it has a draw string thingy so you can adjust it. Genius! What can be better right? It gets better! It arrived in a box that was wide enough so that the shower cap wasn't bent or folded. Then I looked and saw that the seller provided a complementary bathroom hook with the sticky back. If I could hug this seller I would.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap for big hair! Locs, Crochet Braids, etc.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this shower cap. I wear senegalese crochet braids and such and I hate having to use plastic bags in order to take a shower. This cap solved all of my problems. If you have really big hair you should get this shower cap. It even comes with a drawstring to keep it secure and adjust according to your head or hair size.
customer_reviews.author: Sweetie_pie_816

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap on the market
customer_reviews.text: I've been looking for decades trying to find a sturdy long lasting shower cap that will protect very long hair. I'm so glad I found my forever shower cap! This shower cap has been through the ringer over a year with me and it still looks brand new. Thank you to the manufacturers who made such a high quality shower cap!
customer_reviews.author: AG

customer_reviews.title: It Broke.
customer_reviews.text: I used this shower cap a handful of times and the elastic band broke. My hair was straightened not even full or anything and the cap wasn’t on my head. Maybe the cap was old and band was dry rotted. I am not pleased and return window has closed......
customer_reviews.author: F. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Breaks after a couple of uses :(
customer_reviews.text: Update: Used around 10 times and the pulley/elastic thing in the back broke. Changed my review to 3 stars. This cap fits all of my natural hair in it. Even covers up my high buns!
customer_reviews.author: Shatonia

customer_reviews.title: Pleasantly surprised
customer_reviews.text: I read some of the reviews and I was skeptical about the purchase. However, for me I am happy with the purchase. I wear braids and my hair fits inside of the cap with room to spare. I like the draw string, color, and the little hook was a nice added touch. I plan on purchasing a second cap for future use. However, I do believe the product is overpriced. that is the reason for the 4 stars instead of 5.
customer_reviews.author: Tomi T

customer_reviews.title: Fits all my hair properly!
customer_reviews.text: Love this shower cap and the adjustable strap. I go through many hair styles including adding extensions in which doubles the amount of hair I put up when not washing it. This keeps it dry and allows all of it to fit while still fitting my head snuggly. Great shower cap!!!
customer_reviews.author: Becky I.

customer_reviews.title: I’m mad at myself for not ordering 2
customer_reviews.text: This item is beautiful and excellent quality was used to make it. I was so happy when it arrived I took it for a test shower. It held my thick dreads in place while I showered. The adjustable straps was a great idea. I’m ordering another to have as a back up.
customer_reviews.author: SDon

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap for people with natural/voluminous/big/long hair
customer_reviews.text: Great product. No matter what style my hair is in, it covers it. I've had huge hair that other shower caps could barely consider covering! and this has had no issue, *ever*. I also like that the drawstring allows one to adjust the fit around their head as much as is needed. Finally, I got in touch with Simply Elegant (the makers of this product) to ask about buying it when they were out-of-stock, and they were extremely fast and lovely in their communications. Only thing I'd change is providing more colors. This does such a great job, I'd recommend to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: M.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for fluffy natural BIG hair!
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is great quality. I bought an XL because my hair is natural and when it’s out in all its glory, it takes up a lot of space. This shower cap can hold it all! I was shocked! I like the adjustable drawstring because even when my hair is flat ironed I can adjust it to fit tightly to make sure that NO water gets in. I’m a fan.
customer_reviews.author: Krjlaw04

customer_reviews.title: I look like a freak, but it works!
customer_reviews.text: So...not the most attractive look. I definitely look crazy when I'm wearing this. But - the adjustable aspect of it really makes it for me. I can get it just tight enough to stay put, but not to the point that it's uncomfortable. It's by far large enough to cover my whole head - I have a large head, and a humongous amount of hair. This easily covers it all!
customer_reviews.author: Mama Llama

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Just what I needed. I’ve been consistently getting my hair done in butt length textured soft Locs for the last few months and I just needed something big enough to protect all of my hair in the shower. This definitely does the job. It’s adjustable so I just open it to its widest point, sit it on my head and then pull the string so it cups around my locs tight and secure. A great buy id definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wow! This shower cap is surprisingly large and true ...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This shower cap is surprisingly large and true to its manufacturer’s advertisement. My initial impression is that it is made of thick, high-quality material. This shower cap is much more expensive than the typical shower cap (at least, any that I have purchased). However, it is well with the cost, as its quality also far surpasses the typical shower cap. I may even buy another one now, just to have as a spare. I hope that this manufacturer makes other products for people with braids, extensions, and/or long and thick hair.
customer_reviews.author: QuestionabLi

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: The Amazon picture makes this shower cap look so uncomfortable. It's actually super easy to put on and adjust to the circumference of your head. Worth the buy! Especially if you have a lot of hair. The satin liner is a plus too.
customer_reviews.author: User 1988

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I got braids and it was a lot of hair. I wasn’t having luck with the shopping bag strategy and honestly too lazy to do it. I needed a shower cap big enough to fit my braids and keep my hair dry And I found the solution with this shower cap. It’s adjustable so it perfect. It felt secure on my head and kept my hair dry. The only issue I had was that the adjustable string broke. The little ball you use to adjust the cap came off, but I was able to somewhat fix it. However overall it was a great product and I would buy again!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: ... purchased the "fancy" expensive $40 designer shower cap Oprah recommended in last years "Favorite Things"in XL
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the "fancy" expensive $40 designer shower cap Oprah recommended in last years "Favorite Things"in XL..... and completely wasted my money! It would get soaked on the outside and the slippery fabric would gradually make the cap slide off my head. However, this shower cap....OMG... is absolutely AMAZING. Easy to get on. Snug comfortable fit with extra room, and keeps every single drop of water out and my hair completely dry! Can shake water off of the cap and it drys almost immediately!!!!! Love, love, LOVE!
customer_reviews.author: Eclectic Lover

customer_reviews.title: JUST WHAT I NEEDED
customer_reviews.text: PERFECT. I’ve got a ton of hair, it’s very long, and my head is huge like a basketball. I’ve tried so many shower caps from the stores in the past and none of them would fit correctly. This one is absolutely just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: alicia♡

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap for those with long/big hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing! I had a larger plastic shower cap that was huge (even for my long locs) which started to get smelly after a while. While this shower cap is slightly smaller, it has more than enough room for my waist length locs. I also love that it is satin lined!
customer_reviews.author: Chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Finally!
customer_reviews.text: Long hair DO care about getting your locks wet in the shower. This cap is perfect for home or travel. Finally a cap that can get ALL of my hair without doing that weird sit on top of your head and shift thing.
customer_reviews.author: La Negrita

customer_reviews.title: My very thick very long crazy hair stays dry in this cap, amazing, very Happy : )
customer_reviews.text: To help describe how great this shower cap is, I'll share with you that I'm of Irish/Native American descent and this is the only cap that I have found that my very long very thick curly/frizzy hair could fit in and actually stays dry in while showering. I'm impressed and happy. Thank you Simply Elegant : )
customer_reviews.author: DVD Addict

customer_reviews.title: Great product!!!
customer_reviews.text: I am liking it a lot, it holds all of my natural hair!!! Good quality, the inner satin lining it great. The outside is a little stiff...hopefully it will soften up over time. I would definitely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Tye A

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Shower Cap!
customer_reviews.text: I am an African-American woman with dread locs past my shoulder. After trying MANY different caps, I finally found the ANSWER! This cap completely covers my hair and head (which is large :-). The cinch tie is what nails it for me PLUS it's cute with the picture on top AND the price is right. Also, the packaging and note card is a nice touch--I pay attention to detail. I purchased another cap the same time I purchased this one but it cost more and is not half as nice. Look no further, this is THE cap.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No more wet hair
customer_reviews.text: I’m glad I bought this product. Began using it this week and so far so good. It came as described: satin interior, XL size, and adjustable. It does a great job preventing my hair from getting wet, no pieces slipping out. I even like that a hook was included to hang the shower cap in the bathroom. Overall I would recommend this product
customer_reviews.author: imani

customer_reviews.title: Keeps thick curly hair dry
customer_reviews.text: This definitely fits over my long, thick curly hair. It’s a bit more stiff than a traditional shower cap. The adjustable cord isn’t very comfortable as it sometimes gets tangled in my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this at first, but the drawstings have repeatedly come out of where they are designed to stay and it's near impossible to get them back in. Great idea but flawed design!
customer_reviews.author: A. Copeland

customer_reviews.title: A must have!!!
customer_reviews.text: Where have you been all my life!!!???? This is absolutely a must have for anyone who gets braids/weaves and curls. I have waist length braids and I was finally able to shower without getting them wet!!! Hallelujah!!! And to boot I got a nice loofah sponge I wasn't expecting. I especially like the attention to details and the thank you note.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs.King

customer_reviews.title: Well packaged, fast shipping, reasonably priced.
customer_reviews.text: There's not a lot to say about a product like this, especially if there's no Cons to notify other customers about. It keeps shower water out and all the hair dry. It's also sturdy and well made and long lasting.
customer_reviews.author: sci f.

customer_reviews.title: My picky mom loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My mother has a lot of hair and needs something that fits and is reusable... thus, she loves it!
customer_reviews.author: JustineS

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair and was looking for a shower cap for days when I've slept with my sleep stylers in. If you've used them you know how chunky they are and that a typical shower cap can't contain them. Well, this thing was the answer to my prayers! It fits perfectly with a bit of room to spare. It also has a nice stretchy but very durable drawstring with a clamp on it that holds it in place. Well worth the great price!!
customer_reviews.author: Lindserly

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap size and quality !
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is well made and durable. Prior to this one I had trouble getting one that was large enough to fit my braided hair styles or rollers in hair. But this one does the job with extra room to spare. An added bonus is the drW string allows you to adjust the sizing. ( I been share it with my daughter who is 6).
customer_reviews.author: Family and home

customer_reviews.title: A lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: I have very thick, natural hair that I wear in a high bun, and this shower cap+drawstring combo protects it perfectly. I don't have to worry about layering shower caps that won't fit around all of my hair. Major points for making the inner lining satin so that it preserves the style. The creator was even thoughtful enough to include a wall hook to hang it on. I highly recommend and would repurchase in the future.
customer_reviews.author: S. Dennis

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: I don’t have long or thick hair but I have a big head. This shower cap does the trick for me. It is big enough, adjustable and very sturdy - other XL Caps have ripped, but I don’t see that happening with this one. It looks a little funny on my head since most of it’s size is not occupied with my hair, but it works, and it’s all about function for me!
customer_reviews.author: Sue D.

customer_reviews.title: Best shower cap ever
customer_reviews.text: At the time I ordered I had braid extension 24" and this cap was perfect now I find I'm still using it daily w/o braids I love it! The size and fabric both inside and outside is the most sturdy cap I've ever had. The adjustable cord is the best feature I'm going to order one for my daughter
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Simpson-Kravitz

customer_reviews.title: Good but kinda small
customer_reviews.text: Ok so I got this and I would have given it 5 stars if it was just bigger my hair gets big through out the week and when it’s big I cat really fit all my hair in it I have to pineapple it and then mush it down to fit. What I like about this is the draw string for tightening the cap nothing gets in!
customer_reviews.author: Nina

customer_reviews.title: Great product, perfect for my locs
customer_reviews.text: This is my second purchase of this shower cap. I have locs, and all of my hair fits easily and stays dry. The cap itself never did wear out, it was the elastic draw string that lost it's elasticity and it took a couple of years before that happened. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: the artist

customer_reviews.title: Keeps hair dry!! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have a big head/lots of thick hair and all the hair fits under the cap comfortably. The drawstring truly secures it around your head & keeps all moisture out! Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Frosted Miniwheat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Big hair!
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic product. I have waist length thick dreads and this hair cap fits them all in without trouble. The draw string makes it close snug and stay on. The inside is lined with a satin like fabric that makes it feel sturdy and soft. The outside is waterproof. I bought two and plan to buy more.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Locke

customer_reviews.title: Very smelly
customer_reviews.text: Smells really bad after a couple uses and completely dried in between.
customer_reviews.author: B. Carroll

customer_reviews.title: Long Hair or Long Safe-Styled Hair this is the Perfect Shower Cap for You
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is exactly what I needed. My daughter's hair is styled in long twist. The regular shower caps I had simply were not large enough. This cap is extra large and durable. I love that it is slide lock adjust so it can be made to fit snug over any style. It's perfect to keep really long hair and safe-styled hair dry while showering. It was packaged nicely and came width a free loofah and hook for hanging the shower cap up to dry.
customer_reviews.author: kairi

customer_reviews.title: pleased with purchase
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap was exactly what I needed. I have goddess lots crochet and I am able to fit all the hair in the cap. The drawstring is a nice touch to tighten up once on. The material is thick and sturdy. If you have lots of hair, long braids etc, this cap is perfect for keeping dry during your shower.
customer_reviews.author: N. Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Adjustable. Cute. Water resistant.
customer_reviews.text: This shower cap is awesome! It’s definitely one you must have! You’re able to adjust the tightness & it’s just so cute! I go it to keep my braids covered while showering and yes it did it’s job! I also thought it would’ve been wet once I got out of the shower but I truly believe it’s water resistant because it was not dripping water or anything. It’s fabulous! You won’t regret this buy!
customer_reviews.author: Dez S

customer_reviews.title: i have a ton of hair, so happy to find one that fits and covers it all
customer_reviews.text: I have more hair than most people... it is very difficult to find a bonnet that covers all my hair and keeps it dry. This is a great product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: bess gw

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed for my long locs, and exactly as described. I love it! I especially like that it's adjustable. It hasn't been easy finding the right shower cap. Too many companies describe their caps as being jumbo or extra large when they are not. Simply Elegant got it right. I bought two for myself - one for home and the other to keep in my travel bag. I'm also planning to buy a couple more as gifts. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: 2rulyblessed

customer_reviews.title: This was a gift and she loved it
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has a lot of hair, but a small head. She wasn't happy with previous caps she had purchased, so I was on the case to find one that would work. This is the answer! Soft inside, durable and looks sort of nice too.
customer_reviews.author: chrissy

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: Great product; even better customer service. I had a follow up question about this and the owner of the company emailed me back and went above and beyond to satisfy my needs. Amazing! The shower cap is very big and keeps my hair dry. Great for when I have crochet braids. Would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: TN

customer_reviews.title: Game changer!!
customer_reviews.text: Idk why it took me so long to come across a product like this. I have been struggling to put on two cheap plastic shower caps every time I go to take a shower for years now and the elastic parts would just stretch out and be useless after a certain amount of uses. So you know I'm beyond happy I found that a shower cap like this exists! The size and adjustable band on this one make this the perfect design for my long and thick head of hair. Definitely worth the buy.
customer_reviews.author: Sara D

customer_reviews.title: Lining is NOT satin  :(
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower-cap in hopes of using it both in the shower, but more importantly to spritz my hair with water to sleep overnight while keeping moisture in. The satin lining description sold me, but alas, the lining is NOT satin! It is a hard cloth that almost feels like plastic. On first instance i couldn't tell the difference between it and the outer material! I am seriously contemplating returning it, but don't know if the hassle of a return is worth it. I feel like I've wasted my money and could have gotten away with a cheaper shower-cap
customer_reviews.author: AfroCaribbean

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I needed for my shoulder-length locs. As my hair is getting longer, bath time was becoming a chore as far as tying my thick, locked hair up out of the way with ponytail holders. No more struggle with this roomy shower cap. It has a draw string to tighten it to fit your head size and the included cap hanger for your bathroom wall is a nice touch. This cap fits all of my hair with no fuss and I like how durable it's made; it should last a long time. It's about time someone make a shower cap for us big/thick-haired sisters. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: G.M.T.A.K.S.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Protection
customer_reviews.text: I bought this shower cap for my wife, and she's very pleased that now she doesn't need to worry about her hair getting wet when she showers. This extra-sized product offers the added protection she needed, so we both consider it a worthwhile purchase! I would recommend the product and seller to others.
customer_reviews.author: Wild Bill

customer_reviews.title: Large enough, but a bit stiff - good quality
customer_reviews.text: This is not lightweight plastic, but it is rather stiff and made of thicker material than I expected. I was thinking of rating it as a 4 star. It should last forever, I'm thinking though! I like that there's a drawstring to tighten or loosen it. As an extra plus, they included a little hook with a note, so I'm giving them 5 stars for the good packaging and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: can

customer_reviews.title: Product has changed
customer_reviews.text: I first bought this a few year's ago. It was awesome. Bought it again this year and the quality is different. Gets the job done, but not as comfortable applying to my head as previously. I have a full head of braids and never had this much trouble with the first product.
customer_reviews.author: Toya

customer_reviews.title: Must have for thick long natural hair
customer_reviews.text: I wish I would’ve bought this sooner I used to use shopping plastic bags hair still got wet and they was too tight but this works like a charm I love supporting black business
customer_reviews.author: shantell taylor

customer_reviews.title: Big, functional!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is huge! It's functional, which is the main thing. But, I had to get a smaller one to use when traveling! Drawstring helps!
customer_reviews.author: Margo Langley

customer_reviews.title: Gigantic shower cap
customer_reviews.text: Huuuge shower cap. Just what I was looking for. Strong plastic smell when it first arrives. Left it outside for a few days...now no smell.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Brown

customer_reviews.title: Huge and will made
customer_reviews.text: It's definitely huge. You can place alot of hair in here. Too big for my hair and head. Too big for my teen with shoulder length kinky hair. I recommend this for someone with weave, braids or very long hair. I do recommend the product. Very well made. It will last you years.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Humphrey

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Extra Extra Large Shower Cap
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful extra extra large showering cap. I can fit all my goddess locs in this shower cap with no problem. I’ve been using for 3 weeks and my hair has never got wet. It’s adjustable, lined with satin, and beautiful! Would highly recommend to anyone that has a lot of hair.
customer_reviews.author: Ylp

customer_reviews.title: Great cap
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 4a/b natural hair that comes down past bra length when stretched so shoulder length when curly. I traveled with it and use it at home and it’s very comfortable and convenient. I sleep with it inside out when my hair is still wet from wash n gos and it’s still comfortable. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Auburn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for its job..
customer_reviews.text: I love this cap it covers all my dreadlocks and tightens the amount I want it to with a toggle. This cap is durable and will not let any water near your hair while wearing it. It's super cute and great for large hair. I recommend this to anyone who needs a awesome shower cap that works.
customer_reviews.author: ThatGirl208

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING FOR LOCS / BRAIDS
customer_reviews.text: I recently started getting faux locs installed and could not find ANY local stores that carried a shower cap big enough for the extra body my hair now had! I was using 3 showering caps at once! This cap is hands down the best, it comes with a hook that you can hang in your shower so it can drip dry, covers my entire head w/ room for more if needed! The adjustable string is comfortable and secure. I'm going to buy a few more just for traveling and having a little stockpile.
customer_reviews.author: Inga Moe

customer_reviews.title: Great shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the shower cap for my daughter, who has a great deal of hair. The cap works great because it is adjustable. I actually purchased a second cap for her to take on trips. Note that hotels only have standard size caps.
customer_reviews.author: Toni K.

customer_reviews.title: worth it
customer_reviews.text: I have long thick locs, and this is the absolute perfect thing for me. Love the adjustable string to get it on and off easily. Where has this product been all my (loced) life
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One cap keeps box braids dry!
customer_reviews.text: This cap is exactly what I needed to keep my box braids dry, while showering. No more trying to make 2 standard caps work. There’s plenty of room in the cap and the adjustable opening provides an absolutely perfect fit. The construction feels solid and the material is not scratchy or irritating. I’ve already purchased another one for my daughter. I love this cap!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa J S

customer_reviews.title: Good shower cap
customer_reviews.text: My wife said this is great to keep her hair dry Hyundai's that she's not watching it. She said to go up a size to make sure all of your hair will fit.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Tech Guru

customer_reviews.title: Shower bonnet
customer_reviews.text: I am updating my review. It is now the end of may. I am gentle with my belongings and the threading has come loose exposing the stretch band. Do not recommend purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Lalea M. M. King

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Strong sometimes gets lol loose and I have to put out back through, but still a great buy for long thick hair in the shower
customer_reviews.author: RL

customer_reviews.title: Lifesaver!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect for my thick head of long dreads- down to my hips- the band is adjustable so it's always snug and comfy! Keeps my hair nice and dry for those hot summer days where I just need to rinse to cool off! Also it comes with a nice hook to hang it on!
customer_reviews.author: HaleyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: I have long locs and couldn't find a suitable sized shower cap. Every so called jumbo cap was a joke. Until now. This is great! It is actually almost too big. I love that it has a toggle to get a better fit. Durable to boot.
customer_reviews.author: Frediwar

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this shower cap for my 9 year old daughter who has shoulder length thick locs and it works great. My 6 year old now wants one. She has long loose natural hair. If they are pleased with it so am I!
customer_reviews.author: Latoya St Hill

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to adjust.
customer_reviews.text: I didn't care for it. The material was too thick,the bungee cord was very awkward to use. Would not recommend this to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Palakie

customer_reviews.title: I am very happy with this shower cap
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this shower cap. I used to wear 2 shower caps to cover my hair in the shower. I have long very curly hair. thick hair so regular shower caps were too small. The inside of this cap is also lined so it does not mess up my hair.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper!

customer_reviews.title: Finally big enough.
customer_reviews.text: I have locs that are long enough to sit at my lower back. This cap is fantastic! Finally, I don't have to use two "extra large" shower caps---this one is more than big enough! I love that it has a drawstring, too. The materials are good quality, and it seems as if it will last a long time. Certainly keeps the water out and my hair and edges dry.
customer_reviews.author: CSC

customer_reviews.title: Great for long hair!
customer_reviews.text: I love this shower cap! I have really long hair, like past my bottom, and I can fit all of it into this cap! I also love the adjustable strap that allows for a tight fit. It comes with a hook that I hooked inside the closet door in my bathroom for it to hang dry. Definitely recommend this product if you have long hair!
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Kept hair dry for Carnival
customer_reviews.text: Used this for parties at Carnival where there was water being sprayed from hoses. It kept my hair dry. Will definitely buy again.
customer_reviews.author: DenC

customer_reviews.title: Flaking logo, but I still love it!
customer_reviews.text: Product is very durable and has a satin lining. Love the drawstring, it pretty much guarantees that your hair won’t get wet. Only downside is the logo printed on the cap. It fades and flakes off leaving little white prices everywhere. Maybe rubbing with some acetone will get it off completely, but honestly it’s a very small downside compared to how well the cap works.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: it's larger than any I can buy in a store
customer_reviews.text: must larger than you can find in any store, I bought 2 and they seem that they will be very durable.... I wish I bought the large bonnet to sleep in
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann

customer_reviews.title: Accomodates all hair lengths
customer_reviews.text: My hair is waist length, and all of my hair fits easily under the cap. The tightening cord is easy to use and keeps the water out. The cap also comes with a convenient hook to hang the cap up after use. I have 2; may buy more. Very happy with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelynn C. Kee

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: Fine for what it is and VERY spacious. But the elastic to tighten it wears out quickly.
customer_reviews.author: ESSSS

customer_reviews.title: Wayyy too big
customer_reviews.text: This is good for when i have extensions like braids of clip ins, but for my normal hair which is medium short and thick coily hair, its far too big
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally- a shower cap that can fit my hair!
customer_reviews.text: Wow- this really is XL! It actually is bigger than I had expected- but that is no problem! For the first time ever all my hair can fit in a shower cap and not get wet when I shower! I have really curly long hair, and sometimes when I straighten it, I just want to get several days out of all my work before having to wash it again. Problem solved!
customer_reviews.author: Karan W-W the Potter

customer_reviews.title: Best Shower Cap In The World
customer_reviews.text: I love this Shower Cap. I use it everyday. I brought a couple for me and my daughters. Best Shower Cap I ever brought.
customer_reviews.author: Bilqis Jarido

customer_reviews.title: Best for long hair
customer_reviews.text: The best shower cap I've ever use. I will always buy it. Very easy to use and is great for long hair.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Keeps Your Style Dry!
customer_reviews.text: I have very long hair. Whether I go to the salon or style my hair myself, it's a time consuming venture. So after going through all of that, I really don't want to ruin my style by getting it wet in the shower. Other shower caps were just too small to cover all of my hair. This one is plenty big, yet adjustable, which makes it perfect for me. The material feels pretty heady duty, but the inside is smooth and comfortable. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: C.W.R.

product_meta.title: XL Shower Cap - Adjustable & WaterProof By Simply Elegant: The Satin Dream Jumbo ShowerCap X-Large and Extra Cute - The Best in Long Hair Products & Protection (Patented)
feature_bullets: ★ Great present for teens and women!! Got a gift card? Treat yourself! EXCLUSIVELY for EXTRA LARGE heads/styles/long hair (Please see our Large Sized Cap for MED & L Hair Styles). Perfect Water-Proof Shower Cap To Maintain Your Hair Style Whether You Have Natural Hair, Extensions, Braids, Locs, Weaves, Relaxed Hair or Just A Fancy Big Hair Salon Style That You Want To Last! Durable material and big enough for when your is hair is blown out or in dense styles.

★ The ONLY JUMBO with Adjustable Drawstring Satin Lined Showercap (Patent Pending) - Exclusive to Amazon, Exclusive to YOU. Is Your Old Elastic Shower Cap Too Tight or not Tight Enough? Now You Can Finally Make Adjustments to Fit YOUR Comfort Level! We Put the Comfort Back into Your Hands So You Can Easily Avoid Those Dreaded Headlines From Elastic Bands That are Too Tight.

★ Eco-Friendly made with the highest quality EVA; Resists Mildew and Dries Easily making it the perfect Travel Accessory along with your flat iron, curling irons and blow dryer. Purchase a second one to take with you as hotels only have standard sized caps. Look no further for the solution to frizzy after shower hair! Uniquely Designed with a WaterProof Lining to Protect Hairstyles.

★ Carefully Engineered With YOU in mind- Protects your edges, prevents hair loss and breakage promoting HEALTHY HAIR: Double Lined with Satin to Protect Your Hair Instead of Terry Cloth Which Can Cause Breakage. The more expensive EVA material was specifically selected because while PVC (the most common shower cap material) is cheaper it is also known to be associated with cancer. You can feel good knowing we are thinking of you from head to toe!

★ Contemporary Appeal- no more being embarrassed to wear a shower cap, just grab your favorite body wash, body scrub or organic soap and have a refreshing shower knowing your hair will be protected. Perfect for a relaxing shower before bed and pairs nicely with your Satin Dream Sleep Bonnet- Protect your hair in and out of the shower. For complete protection use the Naturally Yours Curly Custard and the Get a Grip Hair Ties.
